message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds of inflation. A 52.5% / 47.5% split seems reasonable.
I think a 55/45 split is a fairer reflection of the value we both bring to the table. Let's get this done and avoid any more inflation!
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting me more each round. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this fairly.
